There are English speaking parts in the movie, I misunderstood this torrent to have selectable dual audio. Not so  the foreign audio parts are "NOT" encoded with English - The included Subs are Danish. no clue on the foreign content of the movie and really is almost #lost. Quality is just alrite. -  TYVM all the same, cheers
